Package photos.controllers

Class AlbumOpenController

java.lang.Object
photos.controllers.Controller
photos.controllers.ListController<Photo>
photos.controllers.AlbumOpenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AlbumOpenController
extends ListController<Photo>
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the part of the normal user subsystem that displays all the photos of a selected album.
Author:
Robert Kulesa, Aaron Kan

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    private class  AlbumOpenController.ImageCell
    Custom ListCell that displays both the image associated with a given Photo as well as its String representation
